sections.text: sarvAqnq. vA EśhO̱&gnau kAmAqn pravEśayati|̍ yO̱-&gnInanvAqdhAya̍# vratamupaiti|̍ sa yadaniśhTvA̍ prayAqyAt| akAmaprItA̍ EnaM kAmAq nAnu prayAyuH|̍ atEjA avIrya̍H̍ syAt| sa juhuyAt|̍ tuByaM tA a~ggirastama|̍ viśvA̱H sukśhitayaH pRuthak|̍ agnE kAmAya̍ yEmira iti|̍ kAmAnEvAsmi̍n̍ dadhAti| 1 (10)

kAmaprItA̍ EnaM kAmAq anuprayA̱nti| tEjasvI vIryAvAn̍ Bavati| | santatirvA̍ EśhA yajñasya|̍ yO̱-&gnInanvAqdhAya̍# vratamupaiti|̍ sa yadudvAyati|̍ vicCitti-rEvAsya̍ sA| | taM prA~jcamuddhRutya̍|̍ manasOpatiśhThEta|̍ manO vai prajApatiH|̍ prAqjAqpatyO yajñaH| 2 (10)

manasaiva̍ yajñaṃ santanOti|̍ BUrityAha|̍ BUtO vai prajApatiH|̍ BUtimEvOpai̍ti|̍ | vi vA Eśha indriyEṇa̍# vIryEṇarddhyatE|̍ yasyA-hitAgnE-ragnira̍pakśhAya̍ti|̍ yAvacCamyayA̍ praviddhyE̱t| yadi tAvadapakśhAyE̱t|̍ taṃ saMBarEt|̍ idaM ta EkaM̍ para uta̍ Eka̱M| 3 (10)

tRutIyEna̍ jyOtiśhAq̍ sam~Mviśasva|̍ sam~MvEśanastanuvai̍ cArurEdhi|̍ priyE dEvAnA̱M paramE janitra iti|̍ brahmaṇaivainaṃq̍ saMBarati|̍ saiva tataH prAyaścittiH|̍ yadi# parasta-rAmapakśhAyE̱t|̍ anu prayAyAvasyEt|̍ sO Eva tataH prAyaścittiH|̍ | OśhadhIrvA̍ Etasya# paśUn payaH praviśati|̍ yasya# haviśhE# vathsA apAkRutAq̍ dhayanti|̍ 4 (10)

tAn. yadduhyAt| yAqtayA̱mnA haviśhA# yajEta| yanna duhyAt| yajñaparu-rantariyAt|̍ vAqyavyA̱M ~MyavAqgUM nirvapEt|̍ vAqyurvai payasaH̍ pradApayitA| sa EvAsmai payaH pradApayati|̍ payO vA OśhadhayaH|̍ payaH payaH|̍ payasaivAsmai̍ payO&varundhE|̍ 5 (10)

athOttarasmai̍ haviśhE# vathsAnapA kuryAt|̍ saiva tataH prAyaścittiH|̍ | anyatarAn. vA Eśha dEvAn BAgadhEyE̍na̍ vyarddhayati|̍ yE yajamAnasya̍ sAqyaM gRuhamAq-gacCanti|̍ yasya# sAyaM dugdhaṃ havirArti-mAqrcCati̍|̍ indrAya̍ vrIhInni-rupyO-pavasEt|̍ payO vA OśhadhayaH|̍ paya# EvAraBya# gRuhItvO-pavasati|̍ yatprAqtaH syAt| tacCRutaM kuryAt|̍ 6 (10)

athEtara̍ aindraH purODAśa̍H̍ syAt| indriyE EvAsmai# samIcI# dadhAti| payO vA OśhadhayaH|̍ payaH payaH|̍ payasaivAsmai̍ payO&varundhE|̍ athOttarasmai̍ haviśhE# vathsAnapA kuryAt|̍ saiva tataH prAyaścittiH|̍ | uBayAqnq. vA Eśha dEvAn BAgadhEyE̍na̍ vyarddhayati|̍ yE yajamAnasya̍ sAqyaM ca# prAqtaśca# gRuhamAq-gacCanti|̍ yasyOBayaṃ# havirArtti-mAqrcCati̍|̍ 7 (10)

aindraM pa~jcaśarAva-mOdanaM̍ nirvapEt|̍ agniM dEvatAnAM̍ prathamaM ~MyajEt|̍ agnimuKA̍ Eva dEvatA̱H prIṇAti| agniM ~MvA anvanyA dEvatA̱H| indramanvanyAH| tA EvOBayI̱H prIṇAti| payO vA OśhadhayaH|̍ payaH payaH|̍ payasaivAsmai̍ payO&varundhE|̍ athOttarasmai̍ haviśhE# vathsAnapA kuryAt|̍ 8 (10)

saiva tataH prAyaścittiH|̍ | arddhO vA Etasya# yajñasya# mIyatE| yasya vratyE&han patnyanA-lamBukA̍ Bavati|̍ tAmaparuddhya̍# yajEta| sarvEṇaiva̍ yajñEna# yajatE| tAmiśhTvO-pahvayEta|̍ amUhamasmi|̍ sA tvaM| dyaurahaM| pRuthivI tvaM ( )| sAmAqhaM| RuktvaM| tAvEhi saMBavAva|̍ saha rEtO# dadhAvahai| puṃqsE putrAya vEttavai|̍ rAqyaspOśhAya̍ suprajAqstvAya# suvIryAqyEti|̍ arddha EvainAqmu-pahvayatE|̍ saiva tataH prAyaścittiH|̍ | 9 (18) special kOrvai (sarvAqnq. vi vai yadi# parastarAmOśhadhIran̍ yatarAnuBayAnardhO̍ vai ) 3. 7. 2 anuvAkaM 2 -agnihOtrasAmnAyyasAdhAraṇAni prAyaścittAni

yadviH śhaṇṇEna̍ juhuyAt| aprajA̍ apaśuryajamAnaH̍ syAt| yadanAyatanE̍ ninayE̱t| anAqyatana-ssyA̱t| prAqjAqpatyayarcA valmIka-vapAyAqma-va̍nayEt|̍ prAqjAqpatyO vai valmIkaH|̍ yajñaH prajApatiH|̍ prajApatAvEva̍ yajñaM pratiśhThApayati|̍ BUrityAha|̍ BUtO vai prajApatiH|̍ 10 (10)

BUtimEvOpai̍ti|̍ tat kRutvA| anyAM dugdhvA punaṛ̍ hOtavya̱M| saiva tataH prAyaścittiH|̍ | yatkITA-vapannEna̍ juhuyAt| aprajA̍ apaśu-ryajamAnaH̍ syAt| yadanAyatanE̍ ninayE̱t| anAqyatanaH syA̱t| maddhyamEna# parṇEna# dyAvA-pRuthivya-yarcA&nta̍H̍ paridhi ninayEt|̍ dyAvApRuthivyO-rEvainat-prati̍śhThApayati|̍ 11 (10)

tatkRutvA| anyAM dugdhvA punaṛ̍ hOtavya̱M| saiva tataH prAyaścittiH|̍ | yadavavRuśhTEna̍ juhuyAt| aparUpa-masyAqtma-~jjA̍yEta|̍ kilAsO# vAq syAdaṛ̍ śasO vA̱| yat pratyEyAt| yajñaM ~MvicCindyAt|̍ sa juhuyAt|̍ mitrO janA̱n kalpayati prajAqnann| 12 (10)

mitrO dAdhAra̍ pRuthivImuta dyAM| mitraH kRuśhTIra-nimiśhAq̍ &BicaśhTE|̍ satyAya# havyaM GRutava-jjuhOtEti̍|̍ mitrEṇaivainat̍ kalpayati| tatkRutvA| anyAM dugdhvA punaṛ̍ hOtavya̱M| saiva tataH prAyaścittiH|̍ | yat pUrvasyAq-mAhu̍tyAṃ̍ hutAyAq-muttarA-&&hutiH̍ skandE̱t| dvipAdBiH̍ paśuBi-ryajamAnO̍ vyRu#ddhyEta|̍ yaduttarayAq̍ &BijuhuyAt|̍ 13 (10)

catuśhpAdBiH̍ paśuBi-ryajamAnO̍ vyRuddhyEta|̍ yatra vEttha# vanaspatE dEvAnAqM guhyAq nAmAni|̍ tatra# havyAni# gAmayEti# vAnaspatya-yarcA samidha-mAqdhAya̍|̍ tUśhṇImEva puna-rjuhuyAt|̍ vanaspatinaiva̍ yajñasyArtAqM cAnA̱rtAqM cAhutI̍ vidAdhAra|̍ tatkRutvA| anyAM dugdhvA punaṛ̍ hOtavya̱M| saiva tataH prAyaścittiH|̍ | yatpurA prayAqjEByaH̍ prA~ga~ggAraH̍ skandE̱t| addhvaryavE# ca yajamAnAya̍ cAkaṅ# syAt| 14 (10)

yad dakśhiṇA|̍ brahmaṇE# ca yajamAnAya̍ cAkaṅ# syAt| yat pratyak| hOtrE# ca patniyai̍ ca yajamAnAya̍ cAkaṅ# syAt| yaduda~g|̍ agnIdhE# ca paśuByaśca̍ yajamAnAya̍ cAkaṅ# syAt| yadaBijuhuyAt|̍ rudrO̱&sya paśUn GAtukaH̍ syAt| yannABi# juhuyAt| aśA̱ntaH prahriyEta|̍ | 15 (10)

sruvasya buddhnEnABi̍ nidaddhyAt|̍ mA tamO̍ mA yajñastamanmA̍ yajamAna-stamat|̍ namastE̍ astvAyatE| namO# rudra parAyatE| namO yatra# niśhIdasi|̍ amuM mA hiṃsIramuM̍ mA hiṃsIriti̍ yEna skandE̱t| | taM praharEt|̍ sahasraśRu~ggO̍ vRuśhaBO jAqtavEdAH|̍ stOmapRuśhThO̍ GRutavA̱n-thsupratIkaH|̍ mA nO# hAsInmEtthitO (hAsIrmEtthitO) nEttvAq jahAma̍ ( )| gOpOśhaM nO# vIrapOśhaM ca# yacCEti|̍ brahmaṇaivainaM̍ praharati|̍ saiva tataH prAyaścittiH|̍ | 16 (13) special kOrvai (yadviHśhaṇṇEna̍ prAjApatyayAq yat kITA maddhyamEna̍ yadavavRuśhTEna̍ yat pUrvasyAqM̍ ~Myat purA prayAqjEBya̍ pra~g~ggArO̍ yad dakśhiṇA̍ yat pratyagyaduda~g~g)̍ 3. 7. 3 anuvAkaM 3 -muKyAgnyasaMBavE&nukalpAH hOmAdhArAH

vi vA Eśha indriyEṇa̍# vIryEṇarddhyatE|̍ yasyA-hitAgnE-ragni-rmathyamA̍nO̍ na jAyatE|̍ yatrAqnyaM paśyE̱t| tata# AqhRutya# hOtavya̱M| agnA-vEvAsyA̱-gnihOtraṃ hutaM Bavati|̍ | yadyanyaM na vindEt| ajAyAṃ# hOtavya̱M| AqgnEyI vA EśhA| yadajA| agnA-vEvAsyA̱-gnihOtraṃ hutaM Bavati|̍ 17 (10)

ajasya tu nAś~jIyAt|̍ yadajasyA̱-ś~jIyAt| yAmEvAgnA-vAhutiM̍ juhuyAt| tAmadyAt|̍ tasmAdajasya̍ nAśya̱M| | yadyajAM na vindEt| brAqhmaṇasya dakśhiṇE̍ hastE# hOtavya̱M| Eśha vA agni rvai̱śvAnaraH| yadbrA̱hmaṇaH| agnA-vEvAsyA̱-gnihOtraṃ hutaM Bavati|̍ 18 (10)

brAqhmaṇaM tu vasatyai̍# nAparundhyAt|̍ yadbrA̱hmaṇaM ~MvasatyA̍ aparundhyAt|̍ yasminnE-vAgnAvAhu̍tiM̍ juhuyAt| taM BAgadhEyE̍na̍ vyarddhayEt|̍ tasmA̱d brAhmaṇO vasatyai̍# nAparuddhyaH|̍ | yadi# brAhmaṇaM na vindEt| darBastabEM hOtavya̱M|̍ agnivAn. vai darBastabaMH|̍ agnAvE-vAsyA̱-gnihOtraṃ hutaM Bavati|̍ darBAṅstu nAddhyAsIta|̍ 19 (10)

yaddarBAnaddhyAsIta|̍ yAmEvAgnA-vAhutiM̍ juhuyAt| tAmaddhyAsIta|̍ tasmA̱d darBA nAddhyAsitavyA̱H|̍ | yadi# darBAnna vindEt| aPsu hOtavya̱M|̍ ApO vai sarvA# dEvatA̱H| dEvatA̱svE vAsyA̱-gnihOtraṃ hutaM Bavati|̍ Apastu na paricakśhIta|̍ yadApaH̍ paricakśhIta|̍ 20 (10)

yA mEvAPsvAhutiM̍ juhuyAt| tAM paricakśhIta|̍ tasmAqdApO na paricakśhyA̱H|̍ | mEddhyA# ca vA EtasyAmEddhyA̍ ca# tanuvau saṃsRujyEtE|̍ yasyA-hitAgnE-ranyairagniBi̍-ragnaya̍H̍ saṃsRujyantE̱| agnayE vivicayE̍ purODAśa-maśhTAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapEt|̍ mEddhyA̱M caivAsyA-mEddhyAM̍ ca# tanuvau vyAvartayati|̍ | agnayE̱ vratapatayE̍ purODAśa-maśhTAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapEt|̍ agnimEva vratapatiṅq̍ svEna# BAgadhEyE-nOpadhAvati|̍ sa EvainaM̍ ~MvratamA-laBaMyati|̍ | 21 (10)

garBaṅq sravantamagadama̍kaH|̍ agni-rindra-stvaśhTAq bRuhaspatiH|̍ pRuthivyA-mavacuścO-taitat|̍ nABi-prApnOti̍ niṛ RutiM̍ parAqcaiH| | rEtO vA EtadvAjina-mAhi̍tAgnEH|̍ yadagnihOtraM|̍ tadyathsravE̱t| rEtO̱&sya vAjinaṅ̍ sravEt| garBaṅq sravantama-gadama̍ka-rityA̍ha|̍ rEta# EvAsmin vAjinaM̍ dadhAti| | 22 (10)

agnirityAha|̍ agnirvai rEtOdhAH|̍ rEta# Eva taddadhAti|̍ indra ityAha|̍ indriya-mEvAsmin-dadhAti|̍ tvaśhTEtyAha|̍ tvaśhTAq vai paśUnAM̍ mithunAnAṃ̍# rUpakRut| rUpamava paśuśhu# dadhAti| bRuhaspatirityAha|̍ brahma vai dEvAnAqM bRuhaspatiH̍ ( )| brahmaṇaivAsmai̱̍ prajAH prajanayati|̍ | pRuthivyA-mavacuścOtaita-dityA̍ha|̍ asyA-mEvainat pratiśhThApayati|̍ | nABi prApnOti̍ niṛ RutiM̍ parAqcairityAha|̍ rakśhasAqmapa̍hatyai|̍ | 23 (15) (ajA&gnAvEvAsyA̱gnihOtraṃ hutaM Bavati̍ - Bava - tyAsIta - paricakśhIta̍ - lamBayati - dadhAti - dEvAnAqM bRuhaspatiH pa~jca# ca) (A3) special kOrvai (vi vai yad yanyamajAyA̱M brAhmaṇasya# darBastambE̱&Psu hOtavya̱m)̍ 3. 7. 4 anuvAkaM 4 -aiśhTikayAjamAnamantrAH

yAH purastA̱t prasravanti|̍ upariśhTAth̍ sarvataśca̍ yAH| tABI# raśmipavitrABiH|̍ śraddhAM ~MyajñamAraBE|̍ | dEvA# gAtuvidaH| gAqtuM ~MyajñAya# vindata| manasaspati̍nA̍ dEvEna|̍ vAtA̱d-yajñaH prayujyatAM|̍ | tRutIyasyai̍ divaH| gAqyatriyA sOma ABRutaH|̍ 24 (10)

sOmapIthAya saMnayituM|̍ vakala-manta̍ramAda̍dE|̍ | ApO# dEvIH śuddhAH stha|̍ imA pAtrAṇi̍ śundhata| upAqta~gkyAya̍ dEvAnA̱M| parṇavalkamuta śundhata|̍ | payO# gRuhEśhu payO# aGniyAsu|̍ payO# vathsEśhu paya indrAya̍ haviśhE̱ dhriyasva| gAqyatrI parṇavalkEna̍|̍ payaH sOmaM̍ karOtvimaM| | 25 (10)

agniM gRuhṇAmi̍ surathaM ~MyO mayO̍ BUH| ya udyantamAq̍ rOhati̍ sUryamahnE̱| AqdityaM jyOtiśhAqM̍ jyOtiruttamaM|̍ śvO yajñAya# ramatAM dEvatA̱ByaH| | vasU̱n rudrAnAdityAn|̍ indrEṇa̍ saha dEvatA̱H| tAH pUrvaH parigRuhṇAmi|̍ sva AqyatanE̍ manIśhayA̱| | imAmUrjaM̍ pa~jcadaśIM ~MyE praviśhTAH|̍ tAndEvAn parigRuhṇAmi̍ pUrvaH|̍ 26 (10)

agniṛ havyavADiha̍ tAnAvahatu|̍ paurṇamAqsaṃ haviridamEśhAqM̍ mayi|̍ AqmAqvAqsyaṃ# haviridamEśhAqM̍ mayi|̍ | antarA&gnI paśavaH|̍ dEvasaṃq sadamAgamann|̍ tAn pUrvaH parigRuhṇAmi|̍ sva AqyatanE̍ manIśhayA̱| | iha prajA viśvarUpA̍ ramantAM| agniM gRuhapatimaBi̍ sam~MvasAnAH|̍ tAH pUrvaH parigRuhṇAmi|̍ 27 (10)

sva AqyatanE̍ manIśhayA̱| | iha paśavO# viśvarUpA̍ ramantAM| agniM gRuhapatimaBi̍ sam~MvasAnAH|̍ tAn pUrvaH parigRuhṇAmi|̍ sva AqyatanE̍ manIśhayA̱| | ayaM pitRuṇAmagniH|̍ avA̱DDhavyA pitRuBya A| taM pUrvaH parigRuhṇAmi|̍ aviśhaM̍ naH pituM karat|̍ | ajasraM̍ tvAṃ saBApAqlAH|̍ 28 (10)

vijayaBAgaṃq̍ samindhatAM|̍ agnE# dIdAya# mE saBya| vijityai̍ śaradaH̍ śataM| | annamAvasathIya̱M|̍ aBiharAṇi̍ śaradaH̍ śataM| AqvasathE śriyaM mantra̱M| ahirbuddhniyO̍ niyacCatu|̍ | idamaha-magni jyE̱śhThEByaH| vasuByO̍ yajñaM prabravImi|̍ idamaha-mindra# jyEśhThEByaH| 29 (10)

rudrEByO# yajñaM prabravImi|̍ idamahaM ~Mvaruṇa-jyEśhThEByaH|̍ AqdityEByO# yajñaM prabravImi|̍ | payasvatI-rOśha̍dhayaH|̍ payasvadvIrudhAqM̍ payaH|̍ apAM payasO̍ yatpayaH|̍ tEna mAmindra̍ saṃsRuja|̍ | agnE̱ vratapatE vrataM cariśhyAmi|̍ tacCakEyaM̍ tanmE# rAddhyatAM| vAyO̱ vratapata Aditya̍ vratapatE| 30 (10)

vratAnA̱M ~MvratapatE vrataM cariśhyAmi|̍ tacCakEyaM̍ tanmE# rAddhyatAM| | imAM prAcImudIcIM|̍ iśhamUrjamaBi̍ saṅskRutAM|̍ bahuparṇAmaśuśhkAgrAM|̍ harAmi̍ paśupAmahaM| | yatkRuśhṇO# rUpaM kRutvA| prAviśastvaM̍ ~MvanaspatIn|̍ tatastvAmEkaviṃśatidhA|̍ saMBarAmi̍ susaMBRutA̱| | 31 (10)

trIn paridhIṅstisraH̍ samidhaH|̍ yajñAyuranusaMcarAn|̍ upavEśhaM mEkśhaṇaM̍ dhRuśhTi̱M| saMBarAmi̍ susaBRuMtA̱| | yA jAqtA OśhadhayaH|̍ dEvEBya# striyugaM purA| tAsAqM parva# rAddhyAsaM| paristara-mAqharann|̍ | apAM mEddhyaM̍ ~Myajñiya̱M| sadEvaṃ̍ śivamastu̍ mE| 32 (10)

AqcCEttA vO mA riśhaM|̍ jIvAni̍ śaradaH̍ śataM| | aparimitAnAqM̍ parimitAH|̍ saMnahyE̍ sukRutAyakaM| EnO mA nigA̱M katamacca nAhaM| punarutthAya̍# bahulA Bavantu|̍ | sakRudAqcCinnaM barq. hirUrṇAmRudu|̍ syOnaM pitRuByastvA̍ BarAmyahaM| asmin thsIdantu̍ mE pitaraH̍ sOmyAH| pitAqmahAH prapitAmahAścAnugaiH̍ saha| | 33 (10)

trivRut palAqśE̍ darBaH| iyA̱n prAdEśa samiMtaH|̍ yajñE pavitraM pOtRutamaM|̍ payO# havyaM karOtu̍ mE| | imau prAṇApAqnau|̍ yajñasyA~ggAni̍ sarvaśaH| AqpyAqyayantau̍ saMcaratAM|̍ pavitrE# havyaśOdhanE|̍ | pavitrE̱ sthO vaiśhṇavI| vAqyurvAqM manasA̍ punAtu| | 34 (10)

ayaM prAqṇaścApAqnaśca̍|̍ yajamAna-mapi̍gacCatAM|̍ yajñE hyaBUtAqM̍ pOtArau|̍ pavitrE# havyaśOdhanE|̍ | tvayAq vEdiM̍ ~MvividuH pRuthivIM| tvayA# yajñO jAyatE̍ viśvadAniH|̍ acCidraM̍ ~MyajñamanvEśhi̍ vidvAn| tvayAq hOtAq santanOtyarddhamAqsAn|̍ | trayastriṃqśO&si̍ tantUnAM|̍ pavitrEṇa̍ sahAgahi|̍ 35 (10)

śivEyaṃ rajjuraBidhAnI̱|̍ aGniyA-mupasEvatAM|̍ | aprasraṃsAya̍ yajñasya|̍ uKE upadadhAmyahaM|̍ paśuBiH saMnItaM̍ biBRutAM| indrAya̍ śRutaM dadhi|̍ | upavEśhO&si̍ yajñAya|̍ tvAM parivEśha-ma̍dhArayann|̍ indrAya̍ haviH kRuṇvantaH|̍ śivaH śagmO BavAsi̍ naH| | 36 (10)

amRunmayaM̍ dEvapAqtraM| yajñasyAyuśhi̍ prayujyatAM|̍ tiraH pavitramatinItAH|̍ ApO# dhAraya mA&tiguH|̍ | dEvEna# savitrOtpUtAH|̍ vasOH sUryasya̍ raśmiBiH|̍ gAM dOhapavitrE̍ rajju̱M| sarvAq pAtrAṇi̍ śundhata| | EtA Acaranti̍ madhumadduhA̍nAH|̍ prajAvatI-ryaśasO̍# viśvarUpAH|̍ 37 (10)

bahvI rBavantIrupa̍ jAyamAnAH|̍ iha va indrO# ramayatu gAvaH| | pUśhA stha|̍ | ayakśhmA vaH̍ prajayAq saṃsRujAmi|̍ rAqyaspOśhEṇa̍ bahulA BavantIH|̍ UrjaM payaH pinvamAnA̍ GRutaM ca|̍ jIvO jIvantIrupa̍# vaH sadEyaM| | dyauścEmaM ~MyajñaM pRuthivI̍ ca saMduhAtAM|̍ dhAqtA sOmEna̍ saha vAtEna̍ vAqyuH| yajamAnAya̍ draviṇaM̍ dadhAtu| | 38 (10)

BUrBuvaH svaH|̍ OjO bala̱M| brahma# kśhatraM| yaśO# mahat| satyaM tapO nAma|̍ rUpa-mamRuta̱M| cakśhuH śrOtra̱M| mana AyuH|̍ viśvaM ~MyaśO# mahaH| samaM tapO harO BAH ( )| jAqtavEdAq̍ yadi# vA pAvakO&si|̍ vaiśvAqnarO yadi# vA vaidyutO&si|̍ śaM prajAByO yajamAnAya̍ lOkaM| UrjaM puśhTiM dada-daByAva̍vRuthsva|̍ | 10 (14) 3. 10. 6 anuvAkaM 6 -anuvAkEśhu navasu lEKAsu nAByAM cEśhTakOpadhAnaM svayamAtRuṇṇOpadhAnaM cOcyatE

asavE̍ svAhAq vasavE̍ svAhA̱| viBuvE̍ svAhAq vivasvatE̍ svAhA̱| aBiBuvE svAhA-&dhipatayE̍ svAhA̱| divAMpatayE̍ svAhA &ṃhaspatyAya̍ svAhA̱| cAqkśhuśhmatyAya svAhA̱ jyOtiśhmatyAya svAhA̱| rAjñE svAhA# virAjñE svAhA̱| samrAjñE svAhA̱ svarAjñE svAhA̱| śUśhAya̍ svAhAq sUryAya̍ svAhA̱| candramasE̍ svAhAq jyOtiśhE̍ svAhA̱| saṃqsarpAya̍ svAhA# kalyAṇAya̍ svAhA̱ ( )| arjunAya̍ svAhA̱| | 12 (11) 3. 10. 8 anuvAkaM 8 -anuvAkEśhu navasu lEKAsu nAByAM cEśhTakOpadhAnaM svayamAtRuṇṇOpadhAnaM cOcyatE

vipaścitE pavamAnAya̍ gAyata| mahI na dhArA &tyandhO# aṛ śhati| ahiṛ̍ ha jIrṇAmatisarpati̍ tvaca̱M| atyO na krIDanna̍ saradvRuśhAq hariH|̍ upayAqmagRuhItO&si̍ mRutyavE̱ tvAq juśhTaM̍ gRuhṇAmi| Eśha tE yOnirmRutyavE̱̍ tvA| | apa# mRutyu-mapakśhudha̱M| apEtaH śapathaM̍ jahi| adhA# nO agna Avaha|̍ rAqyaspOśhaṃ# sahasriṇa̱M| 13 (10)

yE tE# sahasramayutaM̍ pAśA̱H| mRutyO martyAya̍ hantavE|̍ tAn. yajñasya# mAqyayA̱| sarvAqnava# yajAmahE| | BakśhO̱ &syamRuta BakśhaH| tasya# tE mRutyu-pItasyAq-mRuta̍vataH|̍ svagA-kRutasya̍ madhumataH|̍ upahUtasyO-pa̍hUtO̍ BakśhayAmi| | mandrA &BiBUtiH̍ kEtu ryajñAnAqM ~MvAk| asAqvEhi|̍ 14 (10)
andhO jAgRuviH̍ prAṇa| asAqvEhi|̍ badhira A̱krandayita-rapAna| asAqvEhi|̍ ahastOstvAq cakśhuH|̍ asAqvEhi|̍ apAqdAśO manaH|̍ asAqvEhi|̍ kavE vipracittE̍ śrOtra|̍ asAqvEhi|̍ 15 (10)

suhastaH suvAqsAH|̍ śUśhO nAmA̱sya-mRutO martyEśhu|̍ tantvAq&haM tathAq vEda|̍ asAqvEhi|̍ agnirmE# vAqci śritaH| vAgGRudayE|̍ hRudayaM̍ mayi|̍ ahamamRutE̱| amRutaM brahmaṇi|̍ vAqyurmE̱ prAqṇE śritaH| 16 (10)

prAqṇO hRudayE|̍ hRudayaM̍ mayi|̍ ahamamRutE̱| amRutaM brahmaṇi|̍ sUryO# mE cakśhuśhi̍ śritaH| cakśhurq. hRudayE|̍ hRudayaM̍ mayi|̍ ahamamRutE̱| amRutaM brahmaṇi|̍ candramA# mE manasi̍ śritaH| 17 (10)
manO hRudayE|̍ hRudayaM̍ mayi|̍ ahamamRutE̱| amRutaM brahmaṇi|̍ diśO# mE śrOtrE̱ śritAH| śrOtraṃq hRudayE|̍ hRudayaM̍ mayi|̍ ahamamRutE̱| amRutaM brahmaṇi|̍ ApO# mE rEtasi̍ śritAH| 18 (10)

rEtO hRudayE|̍ hRudayaM̍ mayi|̍ ahamamRutE̱| amRutaM brahmaṇi|̍ pRuthivI mE śarIrE̍ śritA| śarIraṃq̍ hRudayE|̍ hRudayaM̍ mayi|̍ ahamamRutE̱| amRutaM brahmaṇi|̍ OśhadhivanaspatayO# mE lOmasu̍ śritAH| 19 (10)
lOmAni̍ hRudayE|̍ hRudayaM̍ mayi|̍ ahamamRutE̱| amRutaM brahmaṇi|̍ indrO# mE balE̱ śritaH| balaṃq hRudayE|̍ hRudayaM̍ mayi|̍ ahamamRutE̱| amRutaM brahmaṇi|̍ parjanyO# mE mUrddhni śritaH| 20 (10)
mUdrdhA hRudayE|̍ hRudayaM̍ mayi|̍ ahamamRutE̱| amRutaM brahmaṇi|̍ IśAnO̍ mE manyau śritaH| manyuṛ hRudayE|̍ hRudayaM̍ mayi|̍ ahamamRutE̱| amRutaM brahmaṇi|̍ AqtmA ma# Aqtmani# śritaH( )| 21 (10)

AqtmA hRudayE|̍ hRudayaM̍ mayi|̍ ahamamRutE̱| amRutaM brahmaṇi|̍ punarma̍ AqtmA punarAyurAgA̱t| punaH̍ prAqṇaH punarAkUta-mAgA̱t|̍ vaiśvAqnarO raśmiBi# rvAvRudhAqnaH| antastiśhThatvamRuta̍sya̍ gOpAH| | 22 (8) special kOrvai (agnir vAqyuH sUrya# ścandramAq diśa ApaH̍ pRuthi vyOśhadhivanaspataya̍ indraH̍ parjanya IśAna̍ AqtmA punarmE̍ trayOdaśa)̍ 3. 10. 9 anuvAkaM 9 -anuvAkEśhu navasu lEKAsu nAByAM cEśhTakOpadhAnaM svayamAtRuṇṇOpadhAnaM cOcyatE

prajApati̍ rdEvAnasRujata|̍ tE pAqpmanAq saMditA̍ ajAyanta| tAn vyadyat|̍ yad vyadyat| tasmA̱d vidyut| tamavRuścat|̍ yadavRuścat|̍ tasmAqd vRuśhTiH|̍ tasmAqd yatraitE dEvatE# aBiprApnutaH|̍ vica# haivAsya tatra# pAqpmAnandyataH|̍ 23 (10)

vRuścataśca|̍ | saiśhA mImAqṃqsA&gni̍hOtra̍ Eva sapaMnnA|̍ athO# AhuH| sarvEśhu̍ yajñakratuśhviti|̍ | hOśhyannapa̍ upaspRuśEt|̍ vidyudasi̍ vidyamE̍ pAqpmAnamiti|̍ atha# hutvOpaspRuśEt|̍ vRuśhTirasi̍ vRuśca# mE pAqpmAnamiti|̍ yakśhyamAṇO̍ vEśhTvA vA̱| vi ca# haivAsyaitE dEvatE# pAqpmAnaM dyataH|̍ 24 (10)

vRuścataśca|̍ | atyaṃqhO hAruṇiH|̍ brahmacAqriṇE̱ praśnAn prOcya prajiGAya|̍ parEhi|̍ plakśhaM daiyA̱M (daiyyA̱M) pAtiM pRucCa| vEttha# sAvitrAM(3) na vEtthA(3) iti|̍ tamAqgatya# papracCa| AqcAryO# mAq prAhaiśhIt|̍ vEttha# sAvitrAM(3) na vEtthA(3) iti|̍ sahOvAca̍ vEdEti|̍ | 25 (10)

sa kasmin pratiśhThita̍ iti|̍ parOrajasIti̍|̍ kastadyat parOrajAq̍ iti|̍ Eśha vAva sa parOrajAq̍ iti# hOvAca| ya Eśha tapati|̍ EśhO̱ &rvAgrajAq̍ iti|̍ sa kasmin̍ tvEśha iti|̍ satya iti|̍ kiM tathsatyamiti|̍ tapa iti|̍ 26 (10)

kasminnu tapa iti|̍ bala iti|̍ kiM tad balamiti|̍ prAqṇa iti|̍ mAsma# prAqṇamati# pRucCa iti# mA&&cAqryO̱ &bravIditi# hOvAca brahmacAqrI| | sahOvAca̍ plakśhO daiyA̱M (daiyyA̱M) pAtiH| yadvai brahmacArin̍ prAqṇamatyaprakśhyaH|̍ mUdrdhA tE vyapatiśhyat|̍ ahamuta̍ AcAqryA-cCrEyA̱n BaviśhyAmi| yO mA# sAvitrE samavAdiśhTEti̍|̍ 27 (10)

tasmA̱th sAvitrE na sam~MvadEta|̍ | sa yO havai sAvitraM̍ ~MviduśhA# sAvitrE sam~MvadatE|̍ sahA̱smi-~jCriyaM̍ dadhAti| anu# havA asmA̍ asau tapa~jCriyaM̍ manyatE| anvasmai̍ śrIstapO# manyatE| anvasmai̍ tapO balaM̍ manyatE| anvasmai̍ balaM̍ prAqṇaM manyatE|̍ | sa yadAha|̍ sajñAMnaM̍ ~MvijñAnaM daṛ śA# dRuśhTEti|̍ Eśha Eva tat| | 28 (10)

atha yadAha|̍ prastutaM̍ ~MviśhTutaṃ̍ sutA sunvatIti̍|̍ Eśha Eva tat| | Eśha hyEva̍ tAnyahAni|̍ Eśha rAtrayaH|̍ | atha yadAha|̍ citraH kEtu rdAqtA pradAqtA̍ savitA̍ prasavitA̍ &BiśAqstA̍ &numantEti̍|̍ Eśha Eva tat| Eśha hyEva̍ tE&hnO# muhUrtAH| Eśha rAtrE̱H| | 29 (10)

atha yadAha|̍ pavitraM̍ pavayiśhyan-thsahasvAqn-thsahI̍yAnaruṇO̍# &ruṇarajAq̍ iti|̍ Eśha Eva tat| Eśha hyEva̍ tE̱ &drdhamAqsAH| Eśha mAsA̱H| | atha yadAha|̍ agniśhTOma ukthyO̱&gniṛ RutuH prajApatiH̍ sam~Mvathsara iti|̍ Eśha Eva tat| Eśha hyEva̍ tE yajñakratava̍H|̍ Eśha RutavaH|̍ 30 (10)

Eśha sam~MvathsaraH|̍ | atha yadAha|̍ idAnI̱M tadAnImiti|̍ Eśha Eva tat| Eśha hyEva̍ tE muhUrtAnA̱M̍ muhUrtAH| | janakO ha vai dEhaH|̍ ahOrAqtraiH samAjagAma|̍ taṃ hOcuH|̍ yO vA asmAn. vEda|̍ vijahat-pAqpmAna̍mEti|̍ 31 (10)

sarva-mAyurEti|̍ aBi svargaM ~MlOkaM jayati|̍ nAsyAq-muśhmin̍ ~MlOkE&nnaM̍ kśhIyata iti|̍ | vijahaddha̍ vai pAqpmAnamEti|̍ sarvamAyurEti|̍ aBi svargaM ~MlOkaM jayati|̍ nAsyAq-muśhmin̍ ~MlOkE &nnaM̍ kśhIyatE| ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ | ahInAq̍ hAśvatthyaH|̍ sAqvitraM ~MvidAM cakAra|̍ 32 (10)

sa ha# haṃqsO hiraṇmayO̍# BUtvA| svargaM ~MlOkamiyAya|̍ Aqdityasya sAyujyaM|̍ | haṃqsO havai hiraṇmayO̍# BUtvA| svargaM ~MlOkamEti|̍ Aqdityasya sAyujyaM|̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ | dEvaBAqgO ha# śrautarq. śhaH| sAqvitraM ~MvidAM cakAra|̍ taṃ ha vAgadRuśyamAqnA̍ &ByuvAca|̍ 33 (10)

sarvambata̍ gautamO vEda|̍ yaH sAvitraM̍ ~MvEdEti|̍ sa hOvAca|̍ kaiśhA vAgasIti|̍ ayamahaṃ sAvitraH|̍ dEvAnA-muttamO̍ lOkaH| guhyaM mahO biBraditi|̍ EtAvati̍ ha gautamaH| yajñOpavItaM kRutvA-&dhO nipapAta|̍ namO nama iti|̍ 34 (10)

sa hOvAca|̍ mA BaiśhI̍ rgautama| jitO vai tE# lOka iti|̍ | tasmAqdyE kE ca# sAvitraM ~MviduH| sarvE tE jitalOkAH|̍ | sa yO havai sAvitra-syAqśhTAkśha̍raM̍ padaṅ śriyA &BiśhiktaM̍ ~MvEda|̍ śriyA haivABiśhicyatE|̍ GRuṇiriti dvE akśharE̱| sUrya iti trIṇi|̍ Aqditya iti trIṇi|̍ 35 (10)

Etadvai sAvitra-syAqśhTAkśha̍raM̍ padaṅ śriyABiśhiktaM|̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ śriyA haivABiśhicyatE|̍ | tadE-tadRucA-&ByuktaM|̍ RucO akśharE# paramE vyOmann|̍ yasmin̍ dEvA adhi viśvE# niśhEduH| yastanna vEda kimRucA kariśhyati|̍ ya it tadvidusta imE samAsata̍ iti|̍ | na havA EtasyarcA na yajuśhAq̍ na sAmnA-&rthO̱&sti| yaH sAvitraM̍ ~MvEda|̍ | 36 (10)

tadEtat pari̍ yaddEvacakraM|̍ AqrdraM pinvamAnaṅ̍ svargE lOka Eti|̍ vijahad viśvA# BUtAni# sapaMśyat|̍ | AqrdrO ha vai pinvamAnaH̍ svargE lOka Eti|̍ vijahan viśvA# BUtAni# sapaMśyann|̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ | śUśhO havai vA̱rśhṇEyaH| AqdityEna# samAjagAma|̍ taṃ hOvAca|̍ Ehi# sAvitraM ~Mviddhi̍ ( )| ayaM ~Mvai svargyO̱&gniH pArayiśhṇu-ramRutAq-thsaMBU̍ta̍ iti|̍ Eśha vAva sa sAvitraH|̍ ya Eśha tapati|̍ Ehi mAM ~Mviddhi|̍ iti# haivainaM taduvAca|̍ | 37 (15) special kOrvai (prajApatirdEvAn̍ sajñAMnaM prastutaM̍ tAnyahA̱nyEśha rAtrayAscitra̍ kEtustE&hnO# muhUrtO rAtrE̱H pavitraM tE̱&rdha mAqsA agniśhTOmO̍ yajñakratava̍# idAnI̱M muhUrtAnA̱M janakO&hInA̍ dEvaBAqgaH kaiśhA vA~gma śUśhO ha vai śhODaśa)̍ 3. 10. 10 anuvAkaM 10 -anuvAkEśhu navasu lEKAsu nAByAM cEśhTakOpadhAnaM svayamAtRuṇṇOpadhAnaM cOcyatE

iyaM ~MvAva saraGA̱| tasyA# agnirEva sAraGaM̍ madhu|̍ yA EtAH pU̱rvapakśhA-parapakśhayO rAtrayaH|̍ tA madhukRuta̍H|̍ yAnyahAni|̍ tE madhuvRuśhAH|̍ sa yO ha vA EtA madhukRuta̍śca̍ madhuvRuśhAṅśca vEda|̍ kurvanti# hAsyaitA agnau madhu|̍ nAsyE̱śhTApUrtaM dhayanti|̍ | atha yO na vEda|̍ 38 (10)

na hA̱syaitA agnau madhu# kurvanti| dhayantyasyEśhTApUrtaM|̍ | yO ha vA ahOrAqtrAṇA̱-nnAmadhEyA̍ni̍ vEda|̍ nAhOrAqtrEśhvA-rtimArcCa̍ti|̍ sajñAMnaM̍ ~MvijñAnaM daṛ śA# dRuśhTEti|̍ EtA-vanuvAqkau̍ pU̱rvapakśhasyA-hOrAqtrAṇA̱M̍ nAmadhEyAni|̍ prastutaM̍ ~MviśhTutaṃ̍ sutA sunvatIti̍|̍ EtAvanu-vAqkAva̍-parapakśhasyA̍-hOrAqtrAṇA̱M̍ nAmadhEyAni|̍ nAhOrAqtrEśhvA-rtimArcCa̍ti|̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ | 39 (10)

yO ha vai muhUrtAnA̱M̍ nAmadhEyAni̍ vEda|̍ na muhUrtEśhvA-rtimArcCa̍ti|̍ citraH kEtu rdAqtA pradAqtA̍ savitA̍ prasavitA̍ &BiśAqstA̍ &numantEti̍|̍ EtE&nuvAqkA̍ muhUrtAnA̱M̍ nAmadhEyAni|̍ na muhUrtEśhvA-rtimArcCa̍ti|̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ | yO ha vA adrdhamAqsA-nA̱~jca̍ mAsAnA~jca̍ nAmadhEyAni̍ vEda|̍ nAdrdhamAqsEśhu̍ na mAsEśhvA-rtimArcCati|̍ pavitraM̍ pavayiśhyan-thsahasvAqn-thsahI̍yAnaruṇO̍# &ruṇarajAq̍ iti|̍ EtE&nuvAqkA̍ adrdhamAqsAnA̱~jca̍ mAsAnA~jca̍ nAmadhEyAni|̍ 40 (10)

nAdrdhamasEśhu̍ na mAsEśhvA-rtimArcCati|̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ | yO ha vai yajñakratUnAM̍ cartUnAM̍ ca# sam~Mvathsarasya# ca nAmadhEyAni̍ vEda|̍ na yajñakratuśhu̍ nartuśhu na sam~Mvathsara̍ ArtimArcCati|̍ agniśhTOma ukthyO̱&gniṛ RutuH prajApatiH̍ sam~Mvathsara iti|̍ EtE# &nuvAqkA yajñakratUnAM̍ cartUnAM̍ ca# sam~Mvathsarasya# ca nAmadhEyAni|̍ na yajñakratuśhu̍ nartuśhu na sam~Mvathsara̍ ArtimArcCati|̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ | yO ha vai muhUrtAnA̱M̍ muhUrtAn. vEda|̍ na muhUrtAnA̱M̍ muhUrtEśhvArti mArcCati̍ ( )| 41 (10)

idAnI̱M tadAnImiti|̍ EtE vai muhUrtAnA̱M̍ muhUrtAH| na muhUrtAnA̱M̍ muhUrtEśhvArti-mArcCati|̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ | athO yathA̱ kśhEtrajñO BUtvA &nu# praviśyAnna-matti|̍ EvamEvaitAn kśhE̱trajñO BUtvA &nu# praviśyA-nnamatti|̍ sa EtEśhAmEva̍ salOkatAqṃq̍ sAyujya-maśnutE|̍ apa# punarmRutyuM jayati|̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ | 42 (9) special kOrvai (iyamahOrAqtrAṇAṃ̍# sajñAMnaM̍ pUrvapakśhasya prastutamaparapakśhasya̍# muhUrtAnA̱M citraH kEturadrdhamAqsAnA̱M̍ pavitraM̍ ~MyajñakratUnAmagniśhTOmO̍ yajñakratUnAmidAnI̱M̍ muhUrtAnA̱M muhUrtAn. vEdEdAnImathO dvAdaśa)̍ 3. 10. 11 anuvAkaM 11 -anuvAkEśhu navasu lEKAsu nAByAM cEśhTakOpadhAnaM svayamAtRuṇṇOpadhAnaM cOcyatE

kaściddhavA̍ asmA-llOkAt prEtya|̍ AqtmAnaM̍ ~MvEda| aya-maha-masmIti|̍ kaścithsvaM ~MlOkaM na prati prajAnAti|̍ | agnimugdhO̍ haiva dhumatA̱ntaH| svaM ~MlOkaM na prati prajAnAti|̍ atha yO haivaita-magniṃ sAvitraM̍ ~MvEda|̍ sa EvAsmA llOkAt prEtya|̍ AqtmAnaM̍ ~MvEda| aya-maha-masmIti|̍ 43 (10)

sa svaM ~MlOkaM prati prajAnAti|̍ | Eśha u# vEvainaM tathsAvitraH|̍ svargaM ~MlOka-maBivahati|̍ | ahOrAqtrai rvA idaṃ sayugBiH̍ kriyatE| iti rAqtrAyA# dIkśhiśhata| iti rAqtrAya# vrata-mupAguriti̍|̍ tAni hAnEvaM̍ ~MviduśhaH|̍ amuśhmin̍ ~MlOkE śEvadhiM̍ dhayanti|̍ dhItaṃ haiva sa śEvadhi-manuparai̍ti|̍ | atha yO haivaitamagniṃ sAvitraM̍ ~MvEda|̍ 44 (10)

tasya# haivA-hOrAqtrAṇi̍|̍ amuśhmin̍ ~MlOkE śEvadhiM̍ na dhayanti|̍ adhItaṃ̍ haiva sa śEvadhi-manuparai̍ti|̍ | BaradvAjO̍ ha triBirAyurBi̍ rbrahmacaryamuvAsa|̍ taṃ ha jIrṇiṅq sthaviraṃq̍ śayAnaM|̍ indra# upavrajyO# vAca| BaradvAja|̍ yattE# caturthamAyurdadyAM|̍ kimEnEna̍ kuryAq iti|̍ brahmacaryamEvainE̍na̍ carEyamiti# hOvAca| 45 (10)

taṃ ha trIn giri-rUpAqna̍ vijñAtAniva̍ daṛ śayAM cakAra|̍ tEśhAqṃq haikaikasmAn̍ muśhTinA&&dadE|̍ sa hOvAca|̍ BaradvAqjEtyAqmantrya̍|̍ vEdAq vA EtE| anantA vai vEdA̱H| EtadvA Etai striBi-rAyurBi-ranva̍vOcathAH|̍ atha# ta itara-dana̍nUktamEva|̍ EhImaM ~Mviddhi|̍ ayaM ~Mvai sarva̍ vidyEti|̍ 46 (10)

tasmai# haitamagniṃ sAvitramu̍vAca|̍ taṃ sa viditvA|̍ amRutO# BUtvA| svargaM ~MlOkamiyAya|̍ Aqdityasya sAyujyaM|̍ | amRutO# haiva BUtvA| svargaM ~MlOkamEti|̍ Aqdityasya sAyujyaM|̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ | EśhO Eva trayI# vidyA| 47 (10)

yAvantaṃ̍ ha vai trayyA vidyayA# lOkaM jayati|̍ tAvantaM̍ ~MlOkaM jayati|̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ | agnE rvA EtAni# nAmadhEyAni|̍ agnErEva sAyujyaṃ̍ salOkatA-mApnOti|̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ vAqyO rvA EtAni# nAmadhEyAni|̍ vAqyOrEva sAyujyaṃ̍ salOkatA-mApnOti|̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ indrasya̍ vA EtAni# nAmadhEyAni|̍ 48 (10)

EvamEva sa tEjasAq̍ yaśasA|̍ asmiṅśca# lOkE-&muśhmiṅ̍śca̍ BAti| | uravO# ha vai nAmaitE lOkAH| yE-&varEṇAdityaM|̍ atha# haitE varIyAṃsO̍ lOkAH| yE parEṇAdityaM|̍ antavantaṃ̍ ha vA Eśha kśhayyaM ~MlOkaM jayati|̍ yO-&varEṇAdityaM|̍ atha# haiśhO-&nanta-ma̍pAqra-ma̍kśhayyaM̍ ~MlOkaM jayati|̍ yaH parEṇAdityaM̍ ( )| | 40 (10)

uśan. ha vai vAjaśravasaH̍ sarvavEdasaM̍ dadau|̍ tasya# ha nacikEtAq̍ nAma# putra Asa|̍ taṃ ha# kumAqraṃ santa̱M| dakśhiṇAsu̍ nIyamAnAsu̍ śraddhA &&vivEśa|̍ sa hOvAca|̍ tata kasmai mAM dA̱syasIti|̍ dvitIyaM̍ tRutIya̱M| | taṃ ha parIta̍ uvAca| mRutyavE̱ tvA dadAqmIti|̍ | taṃ ha smOtthitaM̍ ~MvAgaBivadati|̍ 42 (10)

gautama̍ kumAqramiti|̍ sa hOvAca|̍ parEhi̍ mRutyO rgRuhAn| mRutyavE vai tvA&dAq-miti̍|̍ | taM ~Mvai pravasantaM̍ gantAsIti# hOvAca| tasya# sma tisrO rAtrI-ranA̱śvAn gRuhE vasatAt|̍ sa yadi# tvA pRucCEt| kumAra̍ kati rAtrI-ravAthsI-riti̍|̍ tisra iti prati# brUtAt| kiM prathamAṃ̍ rAtri-mAśnAq̍ iti|̍ 43 (10)

prajAM ta iti|̍ kiM dvitIyAq-miti|̍ paśUṅsta iti|̍ kiM tRutIyAq-miti|̍ sAqdhukRutyAM ta iti|̍ | taM ~Mvai pravasantaM̍ jagAma| tasya# ha tisrO rAtrI-ranA̱śvAn gRuha uvAsa|̍ tamAqgatya# papracCa| kumAra̍ kati rAtrI-ravAthsI-riti̍|̍ tisra iti pratyuvAca|̍ 44 (10)

iśhTAqpUrtayO rmE &kśhitiM̍ brUhIti# hOvAca| tasmai# haitamagniM nAcikEta-mu̍vAca|̍ tatO vai tasyE̱-śhTApUrtE nA kśhIyEtE|̍ | nAsyE̱śhTA-pUrtE kśhIyEtE|̍ yO&̱gniM nAcikEtaM̍ cinutE|̍ ya u# caina-mEvaM ~MvEda|̍ | tRutIyaM̍ ~MvRuṇIśhvEti|̍ puna mRurtyO rmE &pajitiM̍ brUhIti# hOvAca| tasmai# haitamagniM nAcikEta-mu̍vAca|̍ tatO vai sO&pa# puna rmRutyu-majayat|̍ 46 (10)

taM tapO̱& bravIt| prajApatE̍ tapasAq̍ vai śrA̱myasi| ahamu vai tapO̱& smi| mAM nu yajasva|̍ atha# tE satyaM tapO# Baviśhyati| anu# svargaM ~MlOkaM ~MvEthsyasIti|̍ sa EtamA̱gnEya-maśhTAkapAlaM̍ niravapat|̍ tapasE̍ caruM| anumatyai̍ caruM| tatO vai tasya# satyaM tapO# &Bavat| anu# svargaM ~MlOkamavindat|̍ satya ṃ ha vA asya̍ tapO# Bavati| anu# svargaM ~MlOkaM ~Mvindati|̍ ya EtEna# haviśhAq yajatE|̍ ya u# cainadEvaM ~MvEda|̍ sO&tra# juhOti| agnayE svAhAq tapasE̍ svAhA̱| anumatyai̍ svAhA̱ prajApatayE̍ svAhA̱| svargAya# lOkAya svAhAq&gnayE̱ sviśhTakRutE svAhEti|̍ | 16 (19)

taM manO̱&bravIt| prajApatE̍ manasAq̍ vai śrA̱myasi| ahamu vai manO̱&smi| mAM nu yajasva|̍ atha# tE satyaM manO# Baviśhyati| anu# svargaM ~MlOkaM ~MvEthsyasIti|̍ sa EtamA̱&gnEya-maśhTAkapAlaM̍ niravapat|̍ manasE̍ caruM| anumatyai̍ caruM| tatO vai tasya# satyaM manO&Bavat|̍ anu# svargaM ~MlOkamavindat|̍ satyaṃ ha vA asya̍ manO# Bavati| anu# svargaM ~MlOkaM ~Mvindati|̍ ya EtEna# haviśhAq yajatE|̍ ya ucaina̍ dEvaM ~MvEda|̍ sO&tra# juhOti| agnayE svAhAq manasE̍ svAhA̱| anumatyai̍ svAhA̱ prajApatayE̍ svAhA̱| svargAya# lOkAya svAhAq&gnayE̱ sviśhTakRutE svAhEti|̍ | 19 (19)

taM caraṇa-mabravIt|̍ prajApatE̍ caraṇEna̍ vai śrA̱myasi| ahamu vai caraṇamasmi|̍ mAM nu yajasva|̍ atha# tE satyaM caraṇaM̍ Baviśhyati| anu# svargaM ~MlOkaM ~MvEthsyasIti|̍ sa EtamA̱&gnEya-maśhTAkapAlaM̍ niravapat|̍ caraṇAya̍ caruM| anumatyai̍ caruM| tatO vai tasya# satyaM caraṇamaBavat|̍ anu# svargaM ~MlOkamavindat|̍ satyaṃ ha vA asya̍ caraṇaM̍ Bavati| anusvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM ~Mvindati|̍ ya EtEna# haviśhAq yajatE|̍ ya ucainadEvaM̍ ~MvEda|̍ sO&tra# juhOti| agnayE svAhAq caraṇAya̍ svAhA̱| anumatyai̍ svAhA̱ prajApatayE̍ svAhA̱| svargAya# lOkAya svAhAq&gnayE̱ sviśhTakRutE svAhEti|̍ | 20 (19)

agniṛ hOtAq pa~jcahOtRUṇAM|̍ vAgGOtAq śhaDDhOtRUṇAM|̍ mahAhavirq.̍ hOtA# saptahOtRUṇAM|̍ Etadvai catuṛ̍ hOtRuṇAM catuṛ hOtRutvaM| athO pa~jcahOtRutvaM|̍ sarvA# hAsmai diśaH̍ kalpantE| ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ | EśhA vai sarva̍ vidyA| Etad BEśhajaM|̍ EśhA pa~gktiH svargasya# lOkasyA̱M jasAyaniH̍ srutiH| 23 (10)

- havyavAhaq{39} sviśhTaM{40}̍ havyavAha-maBimAtiśhA&ha̱m|̍ rakśhOhaṇaM pRutanAsu̍ jiśhṇum| jyOtiśhmantaM̍ dIdyataM̍ purandhim|̍ agniṅ sviśhTakRutamA̍ huvEma|̍ | {39} sviśhTamagnE̍ aBi tat pRuṇAhi|̍ viśvA# dEva pRutanA̍ aBiśhya| uruM naH panthA̱M pradiśanvi BAhi|̍ jyOtiśhmaddhEhyajara̍M̍ na AyuH|̍ | {40}

- agni rmUrdhA{41} BuvaH{42}̍ agnirmUrdhA divaH kakut patiH̍ pRuthivyA ayaM| apAṃ rEtAṃsi̍ jinvati| | {41} BuvO# yajñasya rajasaśca̍ nEtA yatrA# niyudBiH sacasE̍ śivABiH|̍ divi mUrdhAnaM̍ dadhiśhE suvarq. śhAM jihvAmagnE̍ cakRuśhE havyavAha̱M| | {42} (BOth {41} and {42} appEaring in T. ś. 4. 4. 4. 1) -------------------------------------------------------------
